mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pf_recommendation WHERE member_no = #{member.number} and board_no = #{number}

SELECT r1.*, b.title, b.content, b.view_count, b.registered_date, p.board_no, p.readable, p.homepage, p.thumbnail, p.readable, b.board_no, m.member_no, -- 회원번호 -- m.id, -- id값 -- m.name, -- 이름 -- m.email, -- 이메일 -- g.seeking_flag, -- 재직여부 -- m.photo, -- 사진경로 -- g.membership -- 멤버십 -- FROM ( select r.board_no, count(r.member_no) count from pf_recommendation r WHERE recommendation_date > str_to_date('${startDate}', '%Y-%m-%d') and recommendation_date < str_to_date('${endDate}', '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY r.board_no ) r1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_board b ON r1.board_no = b.board_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_portfolio p ON b.board_no = p.board_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_general_member g ON p.general_member_no = g.general_member_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_members m ON m.member_no = g.general_member_no WHERE p.board_no > 0
ORDER BY r1.count desc, b.view_count desc limit ${startIndex}, ${pageSize}

SELECT count(r1.count) FROM ( select r.board_no, count(r.member_no) count from pf_recommendation r WHERE recommendation_date > str_to_date('${startDate}', '%Y-%m-%d') and recommendation_date < str_to_date('${endDate}', '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY r.board_no ) r1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_portfolio p ON r1.board_no = p.board_no WHERE p.board_no > 0

select s.skill_no, s.name skill_name, f.field_no, f.name field_name, ms.*, ps.*, gm.general_member_no, m.member_no, m.id, p.board_no, p.readable, p.homepage, p.thumbnail, p.readable, b.title, b.content, b.view_count, b.registered_date, count(r.member_no) as count from pf_skill s LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_field f ON s.field_no = f.field_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_member_skill ms ON s.skill_no = ms.skill_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_portfolio_skill ps ON ms.member_skill_no = ps.member_skill_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_portfolio p ON ps.board_no = p.board_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_board b ON p.board_no = b.board_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_general_member gm ON gm.general_member_no = p.general_member_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_members m ON m.member_no = gm.general_member_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_recommendation r ON b.board_no = r.board_no WHERE f.name is not null and ms.member_skill_no is not null and ps.board_no is not null and f.field_no = #{fieldNumber} GROUP BY r.board_no HAVING count > 0 ORDER BY count(r.member_no) desc limit 0, 1
